hotels.title: Anguilla Beachfront Luxury on Rendezvous Bay with 18-Hole Golf Course
hotels.description: Fringed by the gleaming white-sand beaches and translucent waters of Rendezvous Bay, Aurora Anguilla Resort & Golf Course is nothing short of pure bliss. This expansive, Mediterranean-style resort allows guests to discover the natural splendour of the Caribbean with 300 acres of world-class amenities at their fingertips. Golfing enthusiasts can tee off at the stunning Greg Norman-designed 18-hole championship course (opening early 2022), while gourmands can forge a stronger connection with the flavours of Anguilla at one of six exceptional onsite restaurants. Travellers who enjoy an active escape can make use of the onsite tennis courts, fitness centre, bocce, pickleball courts or hit the beach for a sunrise boot camp on the shimmering sands. For moments that call for stillness, the refreshing, holistic Sorana Spa is the place for a restorative experience - or simply stretch out in a cabana by the palm-lined pool. The resort also boasts a fleet of private planes for those who prefer to travel in style.
